parameters.name: Append
parameters.description: True to append this selection to the selection list, false to replace the selection list with this selection

title: ILoop2.Select
description: Selects a loop in the graphics area.
signature:
System.Boolean Select( 
   System.Object
Edge
,
   System.Boolean
Append
,
   System.Object
SelectionData
)

parameters.name: Append
parameters.description: True to append this selection to the selection list, false to replace the selection list with this selection

returns: True if the loop is selected, false if not
remarks:
This loop can share Edge with an adjacent loop, if it exists.
If Edge is:
a valid edge on this loop, this method selects the adjacent loop.
Nothing or null, this method selects this loop.
